thread.title: Krishnaraj Rai, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan's Father, Passes Away. Industry Comes Out To Pay Respect
thread.title_full: Krishnaraj Rai, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan's Father, Passes Away. Industry Comes Out To Pay Respect

title: Krishnaraj Rai, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan's Father, Passes Away. Industry Comes Out To Pay Respect
text:
facebook 
Actress Aishwarya Rai Bachchan's father, Krishnaraj Rai, passed away on Saturday at a hospital in Mumbai. He had been hospitalised a few weeks ago and was later shifted to the ICU. 
Her publicist gave out a statement to PTI , "Aishwarya's father Krishnaraj Rai passed away at Lilavati Hopsital in suburban Bandra." 
The funeral took place on Saturday night, at Seva Shamshan Bhoomi in Vile Parle, where a host of industry friends came in to pay their last respects. 
Our thoughts are with Aishwarya and her family. Rest in peace Krishnaraj Rai.
